content: frankie fish is a cute lil guy and only takes 2 minkins™ chenille balls he s worked from mouth to tail in the round fins are made separately and sewn to the body **finished measurements ** width 10 length 13 **gauge ** 10 single_crochet x 10 row = 4 with larger hook save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns minikins™ chenille 100% polyester 1 76oz/50g 54yds/50m 2174-03 beachbound - 2 balls **hooks & notions ** us size j-10 6mm and h-8 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch markers polyester stuffing small amount of black & white worsted weight yarn
